description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Liverpool, United Kingdom. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Modern Liverpool City Escape Near Royal Alfred Docks with Rooftop Terrace, Restaurant & Gym
hotels.description: Stumble upon luxurious dwellings and welcoming spaces at The Halyard Liverpool, an IHG Hotel, nestled in the heart of Liverpool's vibrant Ropewalks district. Uncover the history of the world’s most iconic band at the Beatles Story Museum and explore the city's rich musical heritage and gastronomic culture at a variety of cafes, restaurants and bars. Return to the hotel's sumptuous interiors, where you can unwind in the elegant Halyard Restaurant over delicious British dishes, or take in sparkling city views from the rooftop terrace.

hotels.title: Heritage Liverpool City Break near Albert Dock
hotels.description: Hotel Indigo Liverpool, an IHG Hotel, welcomes you to celebrate the city's heritage through local tunes, splashes of colour and cotton-themed murals from their quirky, industrial-style hotel. Come for the enviable location in the renowned waterfront district - just steps from the club that made The Beatles stars, Albert Dock and Mersey River - and stay for the welcoming service and authentic onsite dining that pays homage to the rich heritage of Liverpool.

hotels.vendor_name: The Municipal Hotel & Spa - MGallery Liverpool
hotels.title: Liverpool City Centre Landmark Hotel Near Albert Dock with Indoor Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Steeped in heritage on Liverpool's historic Dale Street, one of the city's original seven streets, The Municipal Hotel & Spa is top example of timeless elegance. This landmark building houses 179 well-appointed rooms, the award-winning Thermae Spa with a serene 16m pool, and dining options that celebrate Liverpool's rich maritime connections. Ideally positioned in the city centre, this hotel is moments from cultural attractions including the Royal Albert Dock and the Grade I-listed Royal Liver Building. Just eight minutes from Lime Street Station and a short stroll to Liverpool ONE shopping district, it's the perfect base to explore while indulging in exceptional treatments and dining.

hotels.vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Liverpool John Lennon Airport
hotels.title: Heritage Liverpool Airport Escape with Art Deco Restaurant
hotels.description: Visit the birthplace of The Beatles when you stay at the conveniently located Crowne Plaza Liverpool John Lennon Airport, an IHG Hotel. When not following the footsteps of music royalty, stroll across the road to the New Mersey Shopping Park for an easy feed or shop. Housed in a Grade II 1930s former Speke Aerodrome building, this hotel makes for the quintessential heritage stay with Starways Art Deco restaurant, open all day to curb your craving for European-inspired dishes.

hotels.title: Liverpool Waterfront Escape near the Famous Albert Dock
hotels.description: Once a major port city rich in maritime history, Liverpool is now a vibrant, cosmopolitan hub of trendy restaurants, shopping and nightlife, and it's yours to discover from Crowne Plaza Liverpool City Centre, an IHG Hotel. The hotel is perfectly placed overlooking the waterfront, just a short stroll from the iconic Albert Dock, The Beatles Story and Tate Liverpool Art Museum. When you're not sightseeing, take a dip in the hotel's indoor swimming pool, enjoy a session in the sauna or order a cocktail from the Lounge.
